remarks: A function is zero outside its support.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2014.)  Obsolete version of ~ suppssr as of 28-May-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
suppssrOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
suppssrOLD.n $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { Z } ) ) C_ W ) $.
suppssrOLD $p |- ( ( ph /\ X e. ( A \ W ) ) -> ( F ` X ) = Z ) $.
